mapper.insert: insert into menu_payment(member_no, menu_reserve_time, menu_payment_style, menu_total_price, menu_total_mileage, order_name, order_tel, store_no) values(#{member_no}, #{menu_reserve_time}, #{menu_payment_style}, #{menu_total_price}, #{menu_total_mileage}, #{order_name}, #{order_tel}, #{store_no})
mapper.select: select * from menu_payment order by menu_payment_no desc;
mapper.insert: insert into menu_order (menu_payment_no, menu_no, menu_count, menu_option) values (#{menu_payment_no}, #{menu_no}, #{menu_count}, #{menu_option})
